entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow mixed with rain. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of snow becoming mixed with rain near noon and ending late this afternoon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers. Local snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind light except north 30 km/h near Bowen Island this morning. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 6 this morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers this evening. Wind light except north 40 km/h near Bowen Island late this evening and overnight. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Wednesday 01 February 2023
